original_text: The Lord Almighty is very angry. He punishes the land of Israel, like a fire that burns everything. The people are like wood that makes the fire burn well. None of them try to help each other.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와의 진노로 말미암아 이 땅이 불타리니 백성은 불에 섶과 같을 것이라 사람이 자기의 형제를 아끼지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: The Lord Almighty is very angry.
He punishes the land of Israel,
like a fire that burns everything.
that makes the fire burn well.
None of them try to help each other.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 아무도 서로 돕으려 하지 않습니다.
